long_description: Updated with a better mount, lighter weight and brighter light, the NiteRider Lumina 550 bike light pumps out 550 lumens in a cordless design that keeps it simple when lighting the route ahead. Self-contained design eliminates external battery packs and finicky cords-everything is right there for quick, easy, no-fuss lighting. Together with highly efficient reflectors, the ultrabright LED delivers a nice, even light pattern void of rings or halos. Four continuous light levels include high, medium, low, and the battery-conserving "walk" mode; run times range from 1.5 hrs. on high to 5.5 hrs. on low to 18 hrs. on "walk". Light output for each level includes 550 lumens on high, 250 lumens on medium, 150 lumens on low and 40 lumens on "walk". Also offers a flashing mode for alerting others of your presence; 40 hrs. run time on flashing. Internal lithium-ion battery can be charged from the USB port of your computer, making charging at the office a snap; 5.5 hrs. maximum charge time. Incorporated quick-release handlebar mount on the NiteRider Lumina 550 bike light fits handlebar diameters up to 31.8mm; light can be easily disconnected from mount.
